name: terc-bindlib
author: cammoraton
description: Adds custom BIND providers and types.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.doc: The owner of the record, defaults to the name of the puppet resource

properties.name: content
properties.doc:
The desired contents of a file, as a string. This attribute is mutually
      exclusive with `source`.

parameters.name: manage_serial
parameters.doc:
Whether the provider should automatically increment the serial if the resource is refreshed.
      
      Defaults to true

parameters.name: include
parameters.doc: $INCLUDE statements to insert at end of file.

parameters.name: generate
parameters.doc: $GENERATE statements to insert at end of file before include.  Included for completeness

parameters.name: ttl
parameters.doc: Equivalent to $TTL.  Either numeric or a hash
